justification: "Choice entropy reflects the predictability of choices made by a participant."
"Signal informativeness is a measure of average informational content (in bits) conveyed by each participant within each block of the cooperative task."
"Speech entropy is a measure of average information (measured in bits) transmitted by each participant through speech within a block of the cooperative task."
"Win rate: average percentage of wins in a block or a task, with chance level of 33% because there were three possible choices."
